Text: No on Prop you to vote no on Proposition Funded by three outofstate billionaires this misguided initiative essentially decriminalizes heroin PCP crack cocaine and other hard drugs while seriously undermining Californias highly successful drug courts Opposed by every major California newspaper including LA Times Sac Bee SF Chronicle SJ Mercury and San Diego Union Also opposed by CA AG Bill Lockyer actor Martin Sheen US Senator Dianne Feinstein California Republican Party Betty Ford Center Phoenix House California District Attorneys Association California State Sheriffs Association and over other law enforcement public safety and drug treatment organizations Please pass this message along to your own email list thanks
